name: Bastion Concord
shortDescription: The Bastion Concord are oath-bound defenders of the last still places — a unity of resolve made manifest in stone, shield, and unwavering formation. They believe that holding ground is a sacred act, and that survival itself is doctrine. Their strength is not speed or fire — it is refusal.
description: The Bastion Concord are the last defenders of a fallen empire. Their warriors wear ancient power armor and wield weapons from a forgotten age, fighting to preserve the last remnants of their once-great civilization.
